entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 5:39 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
